director.name: 弗雷德里克·孔潘 Frédéric Compain

introduction: 23 episode documentary, each focusing on one distinguished building and its architect, from the 19th and 20th centuries.Season 1--------------------------------------------------------------------------------Season 1, Episode 1: Das Bauhaus in DessauOriginal Air Date: 2001Who: Walter Gropius What: Staatliches Bauhaus, architecture school Where: Dessau, Germany.Season 1, Episode 2: Die Architekurfakultät PortoOriginal Air Date: 2001Who: Álvaro Siza What: Porto's Faculty of Architecture Where: Porto, PortugalSeason 1, Episode 3: Das Familistère von GuiseOriginal Air Date: 2001Who: Jean-Baptiste Godin What: The Familistère, a community settlement Where: Guise, FranceSeason 1, Episode 4: Nemausus 1 - Sozialer Wohnungsbau der 80er JahreOriginal Air Date: 2001Who: Jean Nouvel What: Social housing complex Where: Nîmes, FranceSeason 1, Episode 5: Das Centre Georges PompidouOriginal Air Date: 2001Who: Renzo Piano, Richard Rogers and Gianfranco Franchini What: Centre Georges Pompidou, cultural complex Where: Paris, FranceSeason 1, Episode 6: Die Postsparkasse WienOriginal Air Date: 2001Who: Otto Wagner What: Post Office Savings Bank Where: Vienna, Austria--------------------------------------------------------------------------------Season 2--------------------------------------------------------------------------------Season 2, Episode 1: Das Villa Dall'AvaOriginal Air Date: 2001Who: Rem Koolhaas; What: Villa Dall'Ava, a single-family house; Where: Paris, FranceSeason 2, Episode 2: Das Johnson-VerwaltungsgebäudeOriginal Air Date: 2001Who: Frank Lloyd Wright; What: Johnson Wax's headquarters; Where: Racine, Wisconsin, USASeason 2, Episode 3: Die Galleria Umberto IOriginal Air Date: 2001Who: Emanuele Rocco;
